member.name: NWMF
member.summary: Flags used by . These values are factors in the decision of whether to display a pop-up window.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_UNLOADING
member.summary: The page is unloading. This flag is set in response to the onbeforeunload and onunload events. Some pages load pop-up windows when you leave them, not when you enter. This flag is used to identify those situations.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_USERINITED
member.summary: The call to is the result of a user-initiated action (a mouse click or key press). Use this flag in conjunction with the flag to determine whether the call is a direct or indirect result of the user-initiated action.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_FIRST
member.summary: When is present, this flag indicates that the call to is the first query that results from this user-initiated action. Always use this flag in conjunction with .

summary.para: The override key (ALT) was pressed. The override key is used to bypass the pop-up manager—allowing all pop-up windows to display—and must be held down at the time that is called.
summary.div: Note When is implemented for a WebBrowser control host, the implementer can choose to ignore the override key.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_SHOWHELP
member.summary: The new window attempting to load is the result of a call to the showHelp method. Help is sometimes displayed in a separate window, and this flag is valuable in those cases.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_HTMLDIALOG
member.summary: The new window is a dialog box that displays HTML content.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_FROMDIALOGCHILD
member.summary: The method is being called from an HTML dialog. The new window should not show the UI in the parent window.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_USERREQUESTED
member.summary: The new windows was definitely requested by the user, either by selecting Open in New Window from a context menu or pressing Shift and clicking a link.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_USERALLOWED
member.summary: The call to the method is the result of the user requesting a replay that resulted in a refresh.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_FORCEWINDOW
member.summary: The new window should be forced to open in a new window rather than a tab.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_FORCETAB
member.summary: The new window should be forced to open in a new tab.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_SUGGESTWINDOW
member.summary: The new window should open in a new tab unless is also present, indicating that user wants the window to open as a window.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_SUGGESTTAB
member.summary: The new window should open in a new tab unless is also present, indicating that user wants the window to open as a window.

member.name: NWMF.NWMF_INACTIVETAB
member.summary: The method is being called from an inactive tab.
